txt.en: You should return the risen Kings and Stewards of Gondor to rest before pursuing the Gloom of Nurn.
As the Gloom of Nurn departs, spirits of fallen Gondorians appear along the Silent Street!
You must defeat the Gloom of Nurn before he can claim the crown of the King for Gothmog.

In his haste to save Faramir, Beregond has thrown open the Fen Hollen and makes for the House of the Stewards. In his wake, the enemies of Gondor descend on Rath Dínen, the Silent Street, all hoping to bring the rule of the Stewards to an end.
Members of the Withered Tree block your advance!
As the last member of the Withered Tree falls, you feel a wave of dread pass over you...
You should search Rath Dínen for signs of Beregond.\n\nRath Dínen, the Silent Street, is the final resting place for the Kings and Stewards of Gondor.
With the risen again put to rest, the path to the House of the Kings lies open!
Confront and defeat the Withered Tree
Defeat the risen Kings and Stewards of Gondor
Search for Beregond in Rath Dínen
You should confront and defeat the members of the Withered Tree that have come to depose the Steward.
